name: Smothered Collard Greens and Cabbage
author: TrudyRudy
summary: This is a wonderful variation of fried (smothered) cabbage.
ingredients: 5 leaves collard greens - rinsed, trimmed and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Fry the bacon with the onion in a large skillet over medium heat until the bacon is crisp, about 10 minutes
Stir in the chopped  , sprinkle with salt, black pepper, and 1/2 teaspoon of the greens seasoning; cook and stir for 5 minutes
Add in the darker chopped cabbage leaves, and cook and stir until almost tender, about 5 minutes
Stir in the remaining cabbage; season with salt, black pepper, sugar, and the remaining greens seasoning
Stir well; cover and cook until tender, stirring occasionally so that the greens do not scorch, about 10 minutes
